modName: Potion of Healing (15x) BAT file (bat hp_potions)
summary: A little BAT file that puts 15 potions of healing in your inventory, and it can be activated through the console. The console code to activate it is: "bat hp_potions" (without the quotation marks)
descriptionHtml:
Are you sick of not having enough potions, but don't want to go to the wiki to find out the ID number and painstakingly enter it? Just use this little BAT file and you'l be good to go!

Just enter: bat hp_potions
author: CreepsterCrawly
